title: or under the provisions of the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited education (delegation ministerial functions) order 2024

title: or under the provisions of the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated
heading: 2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Education conferred on her by
text_raw:
2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Education conferred on her by 
or under the provisions of the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated 
to Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the Department of Education. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [325] 3
text_norm: 2 power duty minister education conferred provision enactment specified schedule delegated hildegarde naughton minister state department education notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 28th june 2024 325 3

title: or under the provisions of the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated
heading: Paragraph (a) of section 7(1) of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998), in so
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Paragraph (a) of section 7(1) of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998), in so 
far as that paragraph relates to persons with a disability or other special 
educational needs (both within the meaning of section 2(1) of that Act) 

Subsections (3) and (4) of section 7 of the Education Act 1998, in so far as those 
subsections relate to the performance of the other functions under that Act 
delegated by this order 

Section 33(i) and (j)(iv) of the Education Act 1998, in so far as those provisions 
relate to persons with a disability or other special educational needs (both within 
the meaning of section 2(1) of that Act) 

Section 37A (as substituted by section 6 of the Education (Provision in Respect 
of Children with Special Educational Needs) Act 2022 (No. 22 of 2022)) of the 
Education Act 1998 

Sections 21, 22 and 28 of, and Schedule 1 to, the Education for Persons with 
Special Educational Needs Act 2004 (No. 30 of 2004) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

25 June, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [325] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
